document_data.name: Flapjack
document_data.mainbody: '''Flapjack''' was a [[flumph]] sailor and [[adventurer]] who traveled [[Wildspace]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Flapjack was an average flumph in appearance. It wore a fashionable seafarer's hat backwards.
document_data.Abilities: When Flapjack left ''[[Moondancer]]'', it kept in touch with the crew and called for a [[ballista]] barrage in times of need.
document_data.History: Flapjack joined the crew of the ''[[spelljammer]]'' called ''Moondancer'' to sail the stars in the late 15{{th}} century DR. After some time, it developed an interest in sightseeing and began accompanying [[adventurer]]s away from the ship's safety.
